Module org.panteleyev.fx
Package org.panteleyev.fx

Class TreeTableColumnBuilder<S,T>

java.lang.Object
org.panteleyev.fx.TreeTableColumnBuilder<S,T>
Type Parameters:
S - The type of the TreeTableColumn generic type (i.e. S == TreeTableView<S>)
T - The type of the content in all cells in this TreeTableColumn.
public class TreeTableColumnBuilder<S,T> extends Object
This class implements builder that creates instances of TreeTableColumn.

      public static <S, T> javafx.scene.control.TreeTableColumn<S,T> treeTableColumn(String text, Consumer<TreeTableColumnBuilder<S,T>> builder)
      Creates tree table column.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the type of the TreeTableColumn generic type
      T - the type of the item contained within the cell.
      Parameters:
      text - column text
      builder - tree table column builder
      Returns:
      tree table column

      Type Parameters:

    • withComparator

      public TreeTableColumnBuilder<S,T> withComparator(Comparator<T> comparator)
      Sets comparator for the tree table column. Such column is also set as sortable.
      Parameters:
      comparator - column comparator
      Returns:
      this

    • withPropertyCallback

      public TreeTableColumnBuilder<S,T> withPropertyCallback(javafx.util.Callback<S,T> propertyCallback)
      Sets property callback for the tree table column. This callback converts object of type <S> to the value of type <T> that is shown in the tree table cell.
      Parameters:
      propertyCallback - property callback
      Returns:
      this

    • withWidthBinding

      public TreeTableColumnBuilder<S,T> withWidthBinding(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<? extends Number> widthBinding)

      Sets binding for TableColumnBase.widthProperty(). This can be used to set column width as percentage of tree table view width.

      Example:

      Parameters:
      widthBinding - binding for widthProperty()
      Returns:
